column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Recommended by a TON of folks
column2: and they DID NOT DISAPPOINT! The pizza was freaking the BOMB!!! Explosion scene just happened
column3: sorry y'all can't see it! Took roughly 33 min to get it
column4: but it was fresh! We went with the Malnati and added pepperoni. We got a large
column6: a medium would've sufficed. Our pre-game consisted of bruschetta and mozzarella sticks
column7: both held their own! For the grand finale
column8: we got the baked cookie! (Free if you ride the big bus) - it was very good.
